sentence: Meanwhile, other GOP figures like Thom Tillis, a senator from Cawthorn's home state, promptly backed one of Cawthorn's primary challengers, Chuck Edwards, while accusing the congressman of embarrassing the GOP.
author: Cheryl Teh
title: Madison Cawthorn criticized GOP leaders for 'weakening' and 'cheapening' the Republican party's platform and chasing 'non-existent middle-ground voters'
